translation.en: ♪ Super Monsters Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
Spike, you know there are other words to that song, right?
translation.ko: 스파이크, 종소리 말고 다른 가사도 있는 거 알지?

translation.en: But "jingle bells" is the funniest part of the whole song!
Hmm... You're right!
♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
I can't believe Christmas is tomorrow!
Christmas is one of my favorite holidays!
Mine too! It's almost as fun as...
translation.ko: 나도 좋아, 그리고 또 좋은 건...

translation.en: Halloween!
Our family and friends will be here soon,
so we need to hurry and finish the party preparations. Oh!
translation.ko: 파티 준비를 빨리 끝내는 게 좋을 것 같은데

translation.en: [grunts] These twinkle lights are all tangled up.
Oh, goodness!
My mommy uses a special comb when my hair gets all tangly.
translation.ko: 제 머리가 엉키면 우리 엄마는 특별한 빗을 써요

translation.en: I wish there was a special comb for untangling twinkle lights.
translation.ko: 엉킨 반짝이 전구를 푸는 빗도 있으면 좋겠구나

translation.en: Speaking of wishes...
Have you thought about what to ask Santa when he comes to our party?
translation.ko: 산타 할아버지가 오면 뭘 부탁할지 생각해 봤니?

translation.en: -What? -Huh?
Santa...?
Is coming here...?
To our school...?
For our party?
Of course.
Santa and I are old, old friends. And he loves holiday parties.
translation.ko: 산타와 난 아주 오랜 친구란다 산타도 파티를 무척 좋아하지

translation.en: Oh! That reminds me. I should bake another batch of ginger snaps.
translation.ko: 그러고 보니 생강과자를 한 판 더 구워야겠구나

translation.en: Santa loves ginger snaps. Especially the ones with lemon icing.
They're his favorite.
I'm going to wish for a super high stack of pancakes! Taller than Igor!
translation.ko: 난 이고르 선생님 키보다 더 높은 팬케이크 달라고 해야겠다

translation.en: I'd like a beaded headdress. With lots of beads!
translation.ko: 난 구슬 머리 장식 구슬 아주 많은 걸로!

translation.en: I wish I had a bigger basket for my broomstick.
translation.ko: 난 빗자루에 달게 더 큰 바구니가 있으면 좋겠어

translation.en: Then Henri can bring a friend.
I'd like a mermaid tail. In rainbow colors!
I wish I had a new baseball bat. No, wait! A batball base!
translation.ko: 난 새 박쥐 방망이 아니, 박쥐 공 받침

translation.en: I wish that my cousin Vida could be here for Christmas.
translation.ko: 난 사촌 비다가 여기에 오면 좋겠어

translation.en: She lives far away, in Ciudad Monstruo, and I miss her.
translation.ko: 아주 먼 괴물 도시에 사는데 보고 싶어

translation.en: That's a nice wish, Lobo. I hope it comes true.
Wait till you see the Christmas tree my dad and I picked out!
translation.ko: 내가 아빠랑 고른 크리스마스트리 보면 놀랄 거야!

translation.en: It's in a really big planter.
After Christmas, we can plant it outside,
and have our very own Christmas tree all the time!
All the time!
How tall is it? Are the branches really bushy?
Well, I didn't exactly see the tree, but the planter is huge.
translation.ko: 그게... 나무는 못 봤는데 화분은 엄청나게 커

translation.en: That sounds very exciting, Frankie. Ooh, and you know what else is exciting?
translation.ko: 정말 신났구나, 프랭키 신나는 일이 또 하나 있지

translation.en: Sun down...
Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Frankie!
Zoe.
Cleo!
Spike!
[all] Super Monsters!
OK, Super Monsters. Drac, Zoe, and I are organizing the decorations.
translation.ko: 잘 들으렴, 얘들아 드락, 조이하고 내가 장식을 달도록 하고...

translation.en: Check!
[grunting] Check!
Igor, Lobo, Spike, and Cleo are in charge of snacks.
translation.ko: 이고르 선생님은 로보, 스파이크 클레오랑 간식을 맡고

translation.en: Yay! I'm good at snacks! I like making them and eating them.
translation.ko: 간식 좋아! 만드는 것도 좋지만 먹는 것도 좋은걸

translation.en: I'm making everything punch! My mom let me borrow one of her cauldrons.
translation.ko: 난 몽땅 펀치를 만들고 있어 엄마가 가마솥을 빌려줬고 만드는 법은 외우고 있거든

translation.en: And I know the recipe by heart.
translation.ko: 엄마가 가마솥을 빌려줬고 만드는 법은 외우고 있거든

translation.en: These sure look good.
[Lobo sniffing] Yum!
I can't wait to put these ornaments on our Christmas tree!
translation.ko: 이 장식품을 크리스마스트리에 빨리 달면 좋겠다

translation.en: It sounds like Frankie found a really big tree.
translation.ko: 프랭키가 엄청 큰 나무를 찾았나 봐

translation.en: So we need to make a lot of ornaments.
Spike. Want to taste the punch?
[Spike gulps] Ah! It's really yummy. Thank you.
Now, what color should I make it?
Hmm... maybe green? That's Christmasey.
But I want to make sure I add something for everyone.
translation.ko: 다들 좋아할 만한 걸 하나씩 넣고 싶어

translation.en: So maybe blue, for Hanukkah?
Or red, for winter solstice?
Or maybe green, blue, and red!
Huh! It's purple. Cool!
The tree is here!
Wait 'till you see it!
Umm... Where's the tree? Right there.
Oh, it's so... small.
Christmas trees are supposed to reach all the way up to the ceiling!
translation.ko: 크리스마스트리는 원래 천장까지 닿는 거 아니야?

translation.en: Oh. But the planter was so big,
and I thought it would be fine to put the tree in our garden after Christmas,
translation.ko: 크리스마스 지나면 정원에다 옮겨 심으면 좋을 것 같았거든, 근데...

translation.en: and...
We didn't mean to hurt your feelings, Frankie.
translation.ko: 기분 상하게 할 생각은 아니었어, 프랭키

translation.en: Maybe it will look bigger if we decorate it!
Well, it doesn't look any bigger...
But it sure is tasty!
I've got this! Holiday magic, give it your all,
translation.ko: 나한테 맡겨 마법의 주문아, 힘을 보여 줘

translation.en: make something big from something so small!
Oh, bats! My witches magic won't work on plants.
translation.ko: 아, 이런! 마녀의 마법이 식물엔 안 통하네

translation.en: Maybe it just needs some water! Spike, will you help me?
translation.ko: 물을 주면 되지 않을까? 스파이크, 나 좀 도와줘

translation.en: OK, If we can't make the tree bigger--
translation.ko: 그래, 트리를 크게 할 순 없지만...

translation.en: We can still make it beautiful! [Zoe laughs]
There's a star on the tree!
Oh, and there's a note with it! It's from Santa.
translation.ko: 쪽지도 같이 왔구나 산타한테서 온 거야

translation.en: Oh, he's sorry, but he won't be able to come to our party.
Apparently, Santa and the elves still have a lot of giftwrapping to do.
translation.ko: 선물 포장할 게 많이 남아서 요정들하고 같이 마저 싸야 한대요

translation.en: But he promises he'll be by to visit everyone later.
And in the meantime, he sent us a Wish Star!
What's a wish star?
A Wish Star is a very special ornament,
it's made with Christmas magic, and it can grant one Christmas wish.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 마법으로 만든 거야 소원을 딱 하나 들어주지

translation.en: But, how does it work?
It's simple, all you have to do is hold the Wish Star in your hands,
translation.ko: 쉬워 이렇게 하면 돼 손에다 소원 별을 들고

translation.en: close your eyes and make a wish.
Ha-ha, yeah!
Cool!
Igor, since Santa is your friend, this Wish Star must be for you!
translation.ko: 선생님, 산타는 선생님 친구니까 이건 선생님 거 아니에요?

translation.en: I already have everything I want.
I can't think of a single thing to wish for.
How about a trip to the moon?
A giant castle made out of cookie dough!
Or a magic cape, so you can fly, like me!
translation.ko: 아니면 저처럼 날 수 있는 마법의 망토는요?

translation.en: Or, maybe a bigger Christmas tree?
I wish I could wish for my cousin Vida to be here.
translation.ko: 사촌 비다가 여기 올 수 있으면 얼마나 좋을까

translation.en: Feliz Navidad, cousin Lobo! Vida!
Surprise, mi'jito!
You're here! You're really here!
I'm here! I'm here! And I'm getting dizzy!
translation.ko: 나 왔어, 나 왔다고 근데 나 좀 어지러워

translation.en: Wow, that Wish Star sure worked fast.
My Christmas wish came true before I even made my wish.
translation.ko: 소원을 빌기도 전에 크리스마스 소원이 이루어졌어요

translation.en: Your father and I have been planning this for weeks.
translation.ko: 네 아빠와 내가 미리 계획한 거야

translation.en: Hey, Lobo, we want to meet your cousin.
Oh, for sure, for sure, for sure!
Vida, this is Cleo, and Zoe, and Spike, and Drac, and Katya, and Frankie!
translation.ko: 비다, 얘들은 클레오, 조이 스파이크, 드락, 카트야, 프랭키야

translation.en: [all] Hi, Vida!
[Vida chuckles] Hi!
Come on, I can't wait to show you everything.
translation.ko: 이리 와 여기 전부 다 구경시켜 줄게

translation.en: Hello, little tree. I know it's kind of small.
translation.ko: - 안녕? 작은 나무야 - 맞아, 되게 작지

translation.en: We don't mind. We love tiny trees!
And really big planters.
This little tree is really happy, because it has lots of room to grow.
translation.ko: 작은 나무가 정말 기쁘대 자랄 자리가 충분하니까

translation.en: Wow! That's the biggest Christmas tree I've ever seen!
How did you do that?
Vida's Super-Monster's super-power is plant magic.
translation.ko: 비다는 식물 마법을 하는 슈퍼 몬스터거든

translation.en: I've never met anyone with plant magic before. It's amazing.
translation.ko: 식물 마법 힘이 있는 괴물은 나도 처음 봐 정말 신기하다

translation.en: Gracias, Super Monsters!
translation.ko: 고마워, 얘들아 난 식물이 자라도록 돕는 게 좋아

translation.en: I love helping green things grow, and Lobo has told me
translation.ko: 고마워, 얘들아 난 식물이 자라도록 돕는 게 좋아 로보가 그러더라 너희도 돕는 걸 좋아한다면서?

translation.en: that you like being helpful too!
translation.ko: 로보가 그러더라 너희도 돕는 걸 좋아한다면서?

translation.en: Dad! Dad! Wait 'till you see the tree!
Oh, wow! It seems so much bigger than I remember it!
translation.ko: 아까 본 것보다 훨씬 더 크구나

translation.en: It certainly is big.
And beautiful. But how are we going to get it into the classroom?
translation.ko: 예쁘고요 근데 어떻게 교실로 가지고 들어가죠?

translation.en: I've got this!
Perfect!
Merry Christmas, Glorb.
Those bells remind me of my favorite Christmas song.
translation.ko: 그 종을 보니까 크리스마스 노래가 생각나네

translation.en: ♪ Ding-ding, dong Ding-ding, dong ♪ ♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
♪ Jingle bells Jingle bells ♪
That is the most beautiful Christmas tree I've ever seen!
And it will look even better when it's decorated.
On it, let's go!
♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh what fun it is to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ko: 우리 썰매 빨리 달려 종소리 울려라

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh what fun it is to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-horse open sleigh ♪
♪ Through the fields we go Laughing all the way ♪
♪ Bells on bob-tail ring Making spirits bright ♪
♪ What fun it is to ride and sing A sleighing song tonight ♪
♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh what fun it is to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
translation.ko: 우리 썰매 빨리 달려 종소리 울려라

translation.en: ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way ♪
♪ Oh what fun it is to ride On a one-horse open sleigh ♪
This is the best Christmas ever! Because you're here, Vida.
translation.ko: 이번 크리스마스는 정말로 최고야 비다 네가 왔으니까

translation.en: And you didn't even need to use the Wish Star!
Sometimes wishes come true without magic!
♪ Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells ♪
Spike, would you and your mom like to come caroling after the party?
translation.ko: 스파이크, 이따가 너희 엄마랑 같이 캐럴 부르러 다닐래?

translation.en: Oh, can we, mom? Can we?
Oh, absolutely! I love caroling.
It's one of my favorite Christmas traditions.
Wonderful! Igor and Esme are coming too!
translation.ko: 잘됐네요! 두 분 선생님도 오실 거예요

translation.en: Yes, Glorb, of course. You can come too.
translation.ko: 그래, 글로브 당연히 너도 오면 좋지

translation.en: Are you coming to our winter solstice party tonight?
translation.ko: 너도 오늘 밤 동지 파티에 올 거니?

translation.en: My mom's brewing hot apple cider, and we're making ginger bread.
translation.ko: 엄마가 사과사이다를 끓이고 있어 생강과자도 구울 거야

translation.en: Yummy! We'll be there! Right, daddy?
Will we see you at the solstice celebration?
You can bring Glorb.
I do love hot apple cider.
And I love home-made gingerbread. But we already have other plans.
translation.ko: 집에서 만든 생강과자도 참 좋고요 근데 다른 계획이 있어서요

translation.en: It's OK, Glorb. You can still go without us.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 글로브 우리 빼고 가도 돼

translation.en: [Frankie] It's called a dreidel.
I love spinning! Fast, fast, fast!
translation.ko: 난 돌리는 게 좋더라 빨리빨리, 빨리빨리!

translation.en: Lobo! You're supposed to spin the dreidel, not yourself.
translation.ko: 로보, 팽이를 돌려야지 네가 돌면 어떡해

translation.en: Oh, oh, too spinney! Can't stop!
I like your wind powers.
And I like your plant magic!
And I like spinning like a Dreidel! Let's do it again!
translation.ko: 난 팽이처럼 도는 게 정말 좋아 또 한 번 하자

translation.en: You should all come over to my house,
translation.ko: 너희 모두 우리 집에 놀러 와 괴물 크기 팽이가 있거든

translation.en: we have a monster-sized dreidel. It's so fun!
translation.ko: 너희 모두 우리 집에 놀러 와 괴물 크기 팽이가 있거든 진짜 재미있어!

translation.en: It sounds like fun, but we're having a tamale dinner at abuelita's house.
translation.ko: 재미있겠다, 근데 할머니 댁에서 타말레 잔치가 있어서

translation.en: Lobo, are you going to go too?
Frankie! You know that abuelita's house is my house too.
translation.ko: 프랭키, 할머니 댁이 우리 집인 거 알면서 그러냐?

translation.en: Of course I'm going, and I can't wait to eat lots and lots of tamales!
translation.ko: 당연히 가지 잔치하면 타말레를 많이 아주 많이 먹을 거야

translation.en: Cleo! You should come for tamales!
Thanks, Vida, but we're going to Frankie's house.
translation.ko: 고마워, 비다 근데 우린 프랭키네 집에 가

translation.en: Mrs. Mash is going to teach us how to make latkes.
translation.ko: 걔네 엄마한테 랏키 만드는 법을 배울 거야

translation.en: Why isn't Albert at our party?
Albert and his family are watching Christmas movies
translation.ko: 앨버트네 가족은 산타 할아버지가 올 때까지

translation.en: while they wait up for Santa to come!
I was thinking, it would be fun to wait for Santa on the roof,
translation.ko: 난 지붕 위에서 괴물 석상들이랑 같이 기다리고 싶은데

translation.en: with the gargoyles!
Drac! Your mother will be very disappointed if you miss the Vampire Ball.
translation.ko: 드락! 흡혈귀 무도회에 빠지면 엄마가 엄청 섭섭해하실 거야

translation.en: Oh, I'm definitely going to the Vampire Ball.
I've been practicing my moves all week!
-♪ One, two, cha-cha-cha ♪ -[Glorb imitates]
translation.ko: 하나둘, 차차차! - 하나둘, 차차차! - 하나둘, 차차차!

translation.en: You have a recipe for fruit cake pizza?
Are you sure you can't come over for tamales?
translation.ko: 정말로 타말레 드시러 못 오시나요, 박사님?

translation.en: I've been cooking all week.
And I made some special cheese tamales for you, Glorb.
translation.ko: 너 주려고 특별히 치즈타말레도 만들었단다, 글로브

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Tamales, oh, sí, sí.
I do love tamales,
but I've already planned a pajama party at the petting zoo.
translation.ko: 하지만 동물원에서 잠옷 파티를 하기로 했어요

translation.en: And the monster pets are so excited.
Of course you can come to the pajama party, Glorb.
translation.ko: 잠옷 파티? 잠옷 파티에 물론 와도 되지, 글로브

translation.en: But then, you'll miss out on abuelita's cheese tamales.
There are so many fun things happening tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤엔 재미있는 일이 너무 많아요

translation.en: It's too bad we can't be everywhere at the same time.
translation.ko: 동시에 다 갈 수가 없어서 안타깝네요

translation.en: Indeed! So, Glorb. What have you decided to do?
translation.ko: 그러게! 자, 글로브 어떻게 하기로 했니?

translation.en: Pajama party, or tamales? Or would you like to come caroling with us?
translation.ko: 잠옷 파티냐, 타말레냐? 아니면 우리랑 같이 캐럴 부를래?

translation.en: Glorb! I'm so glad you decided to come caroling.
I know it was a hard decision to make.
Tamales! [Glorb squeaking]
Dreidel, dreidel, dreidel!
At our house, we celebrate Christmas and Hanukkah.
translation.ko: 우리 집에선 크리스마스랑 하누카를 같이 지내

translation.en: ♪ I have a little dreidel I made it out of clay ♪
translation.ko: 작은 팽이 하나 있어, 진흙 팽이야

translation.en: ♪ And when it's dry and ready Then, dreidel I shall play ♪
Bats! Hot!
Glorb, I'm so glad you're here!
No one ever goes hungry when abuelita is cooking
and tío Jorge is serving the food!
OK, the tamale is totally cooled off. Glorb won't burn his tongue.
translation.ko: 자, 타말레가 다 식었으니까 글로브가 먹어도 된다고

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Gracias, Lobo.
translation.ko: 고마워, 로보 여기 있어, 귀염둥이 글로브

translation.en: Here you go, Glorbie-glorb. A delicious cheese tamale.
translation.ko: 고마워, 로보 여기 있어, 귀염둥이 글로브 널 위해 특별히 치즈를 넣은 타말레야

translation.en: [Vida] Just for you.
translation.ko: 널 위해 특별히 치즈를 넣은 타말레야

translation.en: Everyone has enough to eat? Muy bueno.
♪ Cascabel, cascabel Lindo cascabel ♪
♪ Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él ♪
translation.ko: 우리 썰매 빨리 달려 종소리 울려라

translation.en: ♪ Cascabel, cascabel Lindo cascabel ♪
♪ Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él ♪
♪ Ha llegado Navidad La familia alegre está ♪
♪ Celebrando Nochebuena En la paz del santo hogar ♪
♪ Ha llegado Navidad La familia alegre está ♪
♪ Celebrando Nochebuena En la paz del santo hogar ♪
♪ Cascabel, cascabel Lindo cascabel ♪
♪ Con sus notas de alegría Va anunciando él ♪
Ready for a bite to eat?
I think I'll stay with the carolers. How about you, Glorb?
translation.ko: 전 중창단이랑 같이 있을게요 너는, 글로브?

translation.en: Are you sure?
You're missing out on abuelita's delicious tamales.
translation.ko: 할머니 댁에 가면 맛있는 타말레를 먹을 텐데

translation.en: [speaking Spanish] Feliz Navidad, everyone!
[speaking Spanish] ¡Feliz Navidad!
Now, wait. You were just... How did you...?
Didn't you know he came home with us?
He's been here all night.
He has, has he?
Come on! Time to show everyone that even my dad's moves have moves!
translation.ko: 가요! 제 몸이 리듬을 탄다는 걸 보여 줄 시간이라고요

translation.en: ♪ One, two, cha-cha-cha ♪
Look at that beautiful winter moon!
[both] Two Glorbs? Come back here!
Good evening, Igor.
Well, well, that is interesting, because I have another one right here.
translation.ko: 정말 신기하군요, 여기에도 글로브가 또 하나 있거든요

translation.en: Hello, Glorb!
Hmm, somebody is having more than his share of Christmas spirit.
translation.ko: 크리스마스에 여러 몫을 하는 애가 있나 보네

translation.en: A dancing Glorb, and one with a book? Two Glorbs at the petting zoo?
translation.ko: 춤을 춘다고요? 하나는 책을 들고요? 동물원에도 글로브가 둘 있고 또 다른 글로브가 여기 있고...

translation.en: And another Glorb here.
translation.ko: 동물원에도 글로브가 둘 있고 또 다른 글로브가 여기 있고...

translation.en: Exactly, and I don't know what will happen if all the Glorbs
translation.ko: 맞아요, 해 뜰 때까지 다 모이지 않으면 어떻게 될지 모르겠네요

translation.en: are back together by sunrise.
We have to get all those Glorbs back to the school!
How many Glorbs can there be?
♪ There goes a Glorb In pajamas heading south ♪
♪ There's another Glorb With a tamale in its mouth ♪
translation.ko: 저기 또 가네, 타말레 입에 물고

translation.en: ♪ A Glorb spinning dreidels One dancing by ♪
♪ A Glorb watching movies One is eating pizza pie ♪
♪ One going left One going right ♪
♪ Gonna be at twelve Different places tonight ♪
♪ Glorb's go east Glorb's go west ♪
♪ Can't decide which party He likes best ♪
♪ We wanna know ♪
♪ How many Glorb's can there be? Look, there he goes ♪
translation.ko: 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리 또 있었네, 황당한 일이야

translation.en: ♪ What a monstrous sight to see We wanna know ♪
translation.ko: 또 있었네, 황당한 일이야 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리

translation.en: ♪ How many Glorb's can there be? ♪
♪ On this monster holiday ♪
♪ There goes a Glorb On a merry-go-round ♪
♪ There's one reading a book He's not making a sound ♪
translation.ko: 책을 읽고 있어, 소리 하나 안 내!

translation.en: ♪ A Glorb sipping cider And that one sings ♪
♪ A jingle bell Glorb And a curious thing ♪
♪ One going left One going right ♪
♪ Gonna be at twelve Different places tonight ♪
♪ Glorb's go east Glorb's go west ♪
♪ Can't decide which party He likes best ♪
♪ We wanna know ♪
♪ How many Glorb's can there be? Look, there he goes ♪
translation.ko: 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리 또 있었네, 황당한 일이야

translation.en: ♪ What a monstrous sight to see We wanna know ♪
♪ How many Glorb's can there be? ♪
♪ On this monster holiday We wanna know ♪
translation.ko: 오늘 몬스터 축제 날에 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리

translation.en: ♪ How many Glorb's can there be? Look, there he goes ♪
translation.ko: 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리 또 있었네, 황당한 일이야

translation.en: ♪ What a monstrous sight to see We wanna know ♪
translation.ko: 또 있었네, 황당한 일이야 알고 싶어, 글로브는 몇 마리

translation.en: ♪ How many Glorb's can there be? ♪
♪ On this Super Monster holiday ♪
The Wish Star's wish is gone!
I think we can all guess what happened here.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지 짐작이 가지 않니?

translation.en: Glorb?
I know it seems funny,
translation.ko: 재미있긴 한데 해 뜰 때까지 한데 합치지 않으면

translation.en: but if you're not back together by sunrise, I'm not sure what will happen.
translation.ko: 재미있긴 한데 해 뜰 때까지 한데 합치지 않으면 어떻게 될지 모르겠구나

translation.en: Got it.
Oh, no! That Christmas wish is too powerful to undo!
translation.ko: 아, 이런! 크리스마스 소원이 너무 강력해서 안 돼요

translation.en: We need to make another wish!
With what? The Wish Star's wish is all used up.
translation.ko: 뭘로? 소원 별의 소원도 다 썼는데

translation.en: If only we had another one.
But the only place to get a Wish Star is from...
translation.ko: 소원 별을 얻을 수 있는 곳은 딱 하나 있어

translation.en: [all] Santa! -[Santa laughs] -[children cheer]
Merry Christmas!
Oh, you know? People keep telling me how much we look alike.
Hmm... Looks like someone needs a really big wish.
translation.ko: 보자, 아주 큰 소원이 필요한 친구가 있는 것 같구나

translation.en: I don't think I can do this alone. Does anybody want to help?
translation.ko: 나 혼자서는 할 수가 없겠는걸 혹시 누구 도와줄 친구 있니?

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho. Super Monsters, I need you all to take hands,
translation.ko: 자, 얘들아 다 같이 서로 손을 마주 잡고

translation.en: and make one really big, special, Christmas wish.
translation.ko: 아주 크고 특별한 크리스마스 소원을 빌어 보자꾸나

translation.en: For the 12 Glorbs of Christmas to be one Glorb again.
translation.ko: 열두 크리스마스 글로브가 하나가 되도록 말이다

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
Ho, ho, ho. Oh, are those ginger snaps?
With lemon icing! My favorite!
translation.ko: 이거 레몬설탕 입힌 생강과자가 아닌가? 내가 좋아하는 거야

translation.en: Merry Christmas, old friend.
Merry Christmas, Igor.
Oh, ho, ho, ho. Merry Christmas, Glorb.
I know you thought that having 12 Glorbs was a good idea.
translation.ko: 그래, 열두 마리로 돌아다니겠다는 생각도 나쁘지는 않았단다

translation.en: [Santa] But I think having just one Glorb is perfect.
translation.ko: 하지만 글로브는 하나만 있어도 충분한 것 같구나

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all! And to all, a good morning!
translation.ko: 메리 크리스마스, 여러분 다들 좋은 아침입니다

translation.en: [all] Sun up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Frankie!
Zoe.
Cleo!
[roars] Spike!
[all] Super Monsters!
Vida!
Look, Glorb! Santa left a present for you.
-Oh, what is it? -What is it?
♪ La la la la la la ♪
♪ Super Monsters Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
♪ We're kids who want to learn And help each other grow ♪
♪ There's magic in twilight ♪ ♪ That's when we start to glow ♪
♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, fighting clouds ♪
translation.ko: - 날아라, 드락 - 클레오는 바람 - 용 구름 스파이크 - 조이는 투시력

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
translation.ko: - 용 구름 스파이크 - 조이는 투시력 - 날쌘돌이 로보 - 카트야는 주문

translation.en: ♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
translation.ko: - 날쌘돌이 로보 - 카트야는 주문 프랭키는 쿵!

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters Monsters! ♪
♪ Monsters! Until next time we monster up! ♪
translation.ko: - 몬스터 - 몬스터 다음에 다시 만나요 자막: 임지아, 송은호
